snippet: It's when we're convinced that somebody is out to get us, whether it be Isaac, Roger Goodell or any other conspirator out there, that we turn genuinely optimistic about our chances.
abstract: It's when we're convinced that somebody is out to get us, whether it be Isaac, Roger Goodell or any other conspirator out there, that we turn genuinely optimistic about our chances.

headline.main: We Saints Fans Thrive on Embracing the Horror
headline.print_headline: We Saints Fans Embrace the Horror
